title: Green Tea Matcha Latte Mix
description: Experience the energizing and refreshing taste of matcha green tea with our easy-to-make latte mix. Made from high-quality matcha powder, this blend is perfect for coffee lovers looking to switch up their morning routine. Rich in antioxidants and L-theanine, it promotes a sense of calm focus and clarity. Mix 1-2 teaspoons with 8 oz hot water and enjoy! Nutrition Facts: Calories: 120, Fat: 0g, Protein: 3g, Sugar: 10g

title: Spicy Mango Chili Chips
description: Get your snack on with our Spicy Mango Chili Chips! Made from crunchy rice flour and seasoned with a blend of spices, these chips are perfect for those who love a little heat. With real mango puree and chili peppers, they're sweet, spicy, and addictive. Enjoy as a snack or use as a topping for your favorite dishes. Ingredients: Rice Flour, Mango Puree, Chili Peppers, Salt, Sugar. Nutrition Facts: Calories: 150, Fat: 8g, Sodium: 200mg

title: Aloe Vera and Coconut Oil Body Lotion
description: Nourish your skin with our rich and creamy aloe vera body lotion. Made with coconut oil, shea butter, and essential oils, this lotion moisturizes and soothes dry skin while leaving it feeling soft and supple. Perfect for after-shower use or as a pre-bedtime treat. Ingredients: Aloe Vera Gel, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Vitamin E Oil. Tags: natural, organic, moisturizing
